__e: The blight came and made the air smell like death.
He started coming into work smelling like booze.
He got scared of the bathroom after the incident, and he didn't shower in three or four weeks. He stunk!
Believe it or not, I knew a fellow... who could smell gold like a jackass can smell water.
He was not one of them, but he smelled like a monkey.
It smelled like the number on the door.
And when I came to, I could smell food, like a bakery, I think.
This afternoon I smelled it on another woman.
But when Jess' roommate got home the night she disappeared, there was a smell in the apartment.
I might never have thought of anything to say but then I smelled the smoke from her cigarette.
When I was 7, I smelled the butt of a boy I later dated.
At night, in bed, I could still smell it and I yearned to take her in my arms.
